column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"You can only carry so many items at one time,
but if you use your storage from time to
time, you can avoid drowning in your own junk."

"The default storage can hold up to 200
items, but if you expand it, it becomes even
more useful."

"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the
old days, when I tried to stuff my junk into a... "

"うむ、よろしい！
やはり君は優秀なアークスだな。
杞憂で済んでよかった。"

"所持できる物品の数は限られる！
しかし度々倉庫を利用し
整理していれば問題はない！"

"未拡張のアイテム倉庫では
２００個が関の山だが……拡張すれば
さらに使い勝手も良くなるぞ！"
"いいか、私の利用する倉庫は……"
